body_html: Thanks for the explanation @ebrevdo, I see that the output is as you have explained. My confusion came from how y was constructed, after looking more carefully it's clear that it has shape (?,) and its first dimension indexes the scalars, so the behavior is as expected.

body: Thanks for the explanation @ebrevdo, I see that the output is as you have explained. My confusion came from how `y` was constructed, after looking more carefully it's clear that it has shape `(?,)` and its first dimension indexes the scalars, so the behavior is as expected.
